articles.title: TikTok signs deal to sell U.S. unit to American investors, including Oracle and Silver Lake - PBS
articles.description: TikTok has signed a deal to sell its U.S. business to three American investors — Oracle, Silver Lake and MGX — ensuring the popular social video platform can continue operating in the United States.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) TikTok has signed a deal to sell its U.S. business to three American investors Oracle, Silver Lake and MGX ensuring the popular social video platform can continue operating in the … [+2351 chars]

articles.title: Bazinga! Physicists crack a 'Big Bang Theory' problem that could help explain dark matter - Phys.org
articles.description: A professor at the University of Cincinnati and his colleagues have figured out something two of America's most famous fictional physicists couldn't: how to theoretically produce subatomic particles called axions in fusion reactors.

articles.title: Inflation cools slightly in November as worries about affordability grip Americans - NPR
articles.description: The cost of living in November was up 2.7% from a year ago, according to a report Thursday from the Labor Department.  That's a smaller annual increase than for the 12 months ending in September.
articles.content:
The cost of living continued to climb in November though a little less than two months ago as 7 in 10 Americans say they're barely able to pay their bills. 
Consumer prices in November were up 2.7% … [+3124 chars]
